_header: As Jesu wide about went / He saw a man sit present
Title(s): Northern Homily Cycle ; In festo S. Matthei
Subjects: sermon texts, Gospel; Matthew, saint, feast of
_description: Gospel In festo S. Matthei, in ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle — in couplets

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
AS Ihesu wide a boute wentHe sai a Mon sitte
                    present…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Þorwh goode dedes also doyngeÞat grace vs graunte
                    heuene kynge Amen
